translations.Lua extension not installed on the serve: Lua extension not installed on the server.

translations.An unexpected error occurred when runnin: An unexpected error occurred when running the action.

translations.Scripting tool which allows administrato: Scripting tool which allows administrators to expand the file options menu.
translations.Specify any number of input values the u: Specify any number of input values the user may provide when running this action. These will be accessible to the script via the get_input() function.
translations.A short description of what this action: A short description of what this action will do …
translations.File actions are small Lua scripts that: File actions are small Lua scripts that can create, modify, and/or delete files programmatically. These actions may be triggered by users to be run on their files. Please read the documentation for more information.
translations.File actions are not available because t: File actions are not available because there is no available interpreter. Either install the Lua plugin on the server or enable the experimental interpreter.
